Package com.utilis.game.obj

Class Summary
Collider An abstract class for all classes which can be used in collision detection.
CollisionBox A class for storing the actual solid points that collide with another Collider.
CollisionGroup A class which stores Colliders and does the actual collision detection
Entity Class representing an object that is not locked to a grid and can collide with other Colliders
HUDElement A class representing any kind of custom GUI element
Screen A class for storing and managing a two-dimensiona array of Tiles
Tile A class representing an object that is locked to a grid and cannot move.
 

Exception Summary
